description:
Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi but are unable to get in touch with them. As a last resort, the girls decide to enter a video game tournament where the winner gets a chance to speak with Taiki.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Butterflies of Light: A New Chapter on the Horizon
Cuando vuela la mariposa de las luces.
Hikari no Chou ga Mau Toki! Atarashii Nami no Yokan
光の蝶が舞うとき! 新しい波の予感
